price: 40. Tai ne saulei pasivyti mėnulį, nei naktis aplenkia dieną. Jie visi plaukia, kiekvienas orbita.
arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā al-shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tud'rika al-qamara walā al-laylu sābiqu al-nahāri wakullun fī falakin yasbaḥūna
